column2: Add dA base to 3' ends of dsDNA
ds DNA with single 3' A overhang

An overhanging adenine (A) base is added to the 3' end of the blunt DNA fragments bythe use of Klenow fragment. This aids the ligation of the Illumina adapters, which havea single thymine (T) base overhang at their 3' ends.

Combine and mix the following components in a clean microcentrifuge tube:34 _l end-repaired DNA from step (Illumina, End repair of fragmented ds cDNA).35 _l of Klenow buffer (NEB buffer 2)10 _l of 1 mM dATP (see note below)1 _l of Klenow fragment (3' to 5' exo-)Total volume should be 50 _l.1 mM dATP stocks should be prepared using 100 mM dATP from NEB. Store the 1 mMdATP in 25-_l aliquots at -20_C. Thaw stocks only once for use in the above describedreaction, as dATP is adversely affected by freeze-thaw cycles.

column5: Buffer, Klenow (NEB buffer 2; New England Biolabs)
Enzyme Mix, Klenow fragment (3' to 5' exo-) (New England Biolabs)

1 mM dATP stocks should be prepared using 100 mM dATP from NEB. Store the 1 mM dATP in 25-_l aliquots at -20_C. Thaw stocks only once for use in the above described reaction, as dATP is adversely affected by freeze-thaw cycles.

column2: Incubate 30 min at 37_C in a water bath or heat block.
column5: in a water bath or heat block

column2: Purify using Qiagen's QIAquick MinElute PCR Purification kit. Follow themanufacturer's recommended protocol, and elute in a final volume of 10 _l of Buffer EB.Note that this kit uses different elution columns than the QIAquick PCR Purification kit.

column5: Qiagen's QIAquick MinElute PCR Purification kit
Nucleic Acid, DNA, double-stranded, with single 3' A overhang
Nucleic Acid, DNA, double-stranded, with single 3' A overhang
Follow the manufacturer's recommended protocol, but elute in a final volume of10 _l of Buffer EB. Note that this kit uses different elution columns than the QIAquick PCR Purification kit.
